job_tasks.phrase: take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business problems and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: AI solutions that create business impact
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the requirement to ensure AI solutions have a tangible effect on the business.

job_tasks.phrase: build, deploy, and maintain machine learning models
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the core activity of creating and managing ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content.
job_tasks.justification: Lists specific applications of machine learning models, falling under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions fine-tuning LLMs, a key generative AI modeling technique.

job_tasks.phrase: design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
job_tasks.justification: Refers to the architectural and design aspects of building software solutions.
Indicates the development and deployment of AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Points to the software engineering task of integrating and deploying solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy, and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions MLOps pipelines, indicating operational aspects of AI/ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the responsibility of deploying MLOps pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the need to collaborate with various technical teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes communicating complex technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Indicates the need to tackle and resolve challenging business issues using AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment. A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.
job_tasks.justification: Suggests an environment that encourages innovative approaches and independent work.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants
Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions
Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment. A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building, fine-tuning, and deploying Generative AI applications, particularly LLMs. It also highlights software development tasks like designing solutions and ensuring integration, alongside MLOps for deployment, which are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
